summary: Ocho gets abducted by a yakuza clan that uses a gang of women to smuggle drugs in their vaginas. Finding out that the kingpin had killed the last boss and abducted his daughter, Ocho joins forces with the drug mules against the clan.
cast: Reiko Ike|Makoto Aikawa|Arumi Kuri|Meika Seri|Jun Midorikawa|Emi Jô|Tôru Abe|Keiko Aikawa|Kanjûrô Arashi|Tarô Bonten|Tatsuo Endô|Wakako Hara|Hiroshi Hatano|Yukari Hayami|Shin'ichirô Hayashi|Midori Hoshino|Rena Ichinose|Akemi Kasuga|Kuniomi Kitani|Yukio Miyagi|Hiroshi Nawa|Akemi Negishi|Mari Saegusa|Rie Saotome|Shunji Sasaki|Yuko Shiose|Ryôhei Uchida|Akira Ôizumi
title: Yasagure anego den: Sôkatsu rinchi
